CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV leaves the room closing the door
CHI stands in the center of the room looking around with a fistful of fingers in his mouth
MOT walks over to CHI placing a hand on each side of CHI head
MOT is visible from the waist down
<aft> MOT takes a box off the table then walks across room and sits down on the floor
CHI follows MOT across room then kneels down on the floor beside MOT
CHI back is to the camera
MOT reaches out moving CHI over a bit
<bef> MOT takes the cover off of the box
MOT looks up at CHI then down
MOT holds book up in her hands
CHI kneels on the floor with his back to the camera
MOT opens the book to the first page
MOT moves the bottom half of the box out of the way
CHI moves on his knees until he is across from MOT
CHI is now visible sideview to the camera
MOT holds the book out between them
CHI looks down with a fistful of fingers in his mouth then looks up
CHI looks up in response to noise outside the room
MOT outlines the shape of the window with her finger on the book
CHI speaks with fingers in his mouth
CHI speaks with fingers in mouth
<bef> CHI takes fingers out of his mouth . CHI then puts fingers back into his mouth after he speaks
MOT points to one image then another in the book
CHI looks up at MOT briefly then down at the book
CHI takes his fingers out of his mouth
CHI looks at MOT then at book putting his fingers back in his mouth
MOT closes the book then puts it back in the box next to her on the floor
CHI stands up then walks across the room . CHI turns around to look in direction of MOT
MOT stands up then walks across the room
MOT is visible from the waist down . CHI back is to the camera with his head only in full view
MOT sits down on the floor with a new box
CHI walks towards MOT then kneels on the floor beside her
<bef> CHI reaches into the box removing the puppets
CHI back is to the camera
MOT moves puppet box out of the way
MOT reaches for CHI . MOT turns CHI so he is facing her
CHI is visible sideview to the camera
CHI holds out one puppet towards MOT
<bef> MOT reaches for puppet then takes the one CHI offers and puts it on her hand
CHI reaches for puppet MOT is wearing
< .1-3 .> MOT turns puppet towards herself then back towards CHI
MOT says something in a different voice
MOT reaches over to CHI with puppet then kisses him on the cheek with the puppet
<aft> CHI puts the puppet on his hand
<aft> CHI holds the puppet up to MOT face
MOT holds the puppet out towards CHI pretending puppet speaks
CHI holds out his puppet towards MOT puppet
<bef> MOT turns the puppet towards herself looking at it then turns it around towards CHI
CHI reaches for MOT puppet with his puppet
CHI and MOT puppets are face to face
CHI stuffs his puppet into mouth of MOT puppet
MOT clenches her puppets mouth around CHI puppet then releases CHI puppet
CHI turns his puppet towards himself . CHI touches puppet eyes as he looks down
CHI points to puppet mouth then looks up at MOT
CHI holds the puppet out to meet MOT puppet
MOT clenches puppets mouth around CHI puppet then releases it
CHI hits MOT puppet with his puppet then puts his puppet in the mouth of MOT puppet
CHI reaches out to touch the eyes of MOT puppet with his other hand while pulling his puppet back away from MOT
CHI looks down then holds his puppet out towards MOT
MOT reaches for CHI stomach with her puppet pretending to eat
CHI leans forward . CHI reaches up to MOT face touching it with his puppet then leans back on his heels
MOT touches CHI with his puppet
CHI holds his puppet out to MOT
MOT and CHI play back and forth with their puppets making the same noise
CHI thrusts his puppet out in the direction of MOT
MOT holds her puppet out towards CHI
CHI rocks up then down on his knees thrusting his puppet out towards MOT
MOT reaches for CHI ear with her puppet
CHI looks down then up at MOT
<bef> MOT pretends to eat CHI ear with puppet
CHI reaches out to MOT with his puppet
CHI leans back on his heels
MOT reaches out touching CHI face with her puppet
CHI looks down then begins to stand up
CHI shakes the puppet off his hand then picks it up again
CHI looks down as he places the puppet back on his hand
CHI pulls puppet back then looks down
CHI looks over his shoulder at something
MOT puts her puppet in the box on the floor
CHI turns around on his knees then puts his puppet in the box
MOT puts the cover on the puppet box
<aft> CHI turns around on his knees then stands up . CHI walks across the room then reaches for another box
MOT walks over to table where CHI stands
MOT is visible from the waist down
<bef> MOT slides a new box off the table then hands it to CHI
CHI reaches for the box as he walks across the room with MOT
MOT sits on the floor as she reaches out for the box CHI is holding
CHI kneels on the floor in front of MOT placing the box between them
MOT reaches for the box to position it on the floor between them
<bef> MOT reaches into box touching the paper
CHI takes some paper out of the box
CHI reaches back into the box taking out a crayon
MOT pushes half of the box out of the way
CHI places the paper and crayon on the floor
CHI turns then reaches for another piece of paper in the box that MOT has moved away
CHI takes the paper out of the box
CHI puts the paper on the floor in front of him
<bef> MOT moves the box out of the way
<bef> CHI picks up a crayon off the floor . CHI colors
CHI colors on one piece of paper . CHI switches over to another piece of paper beside the original one then back to the paper in front of him
CHI looks up from the drawing then back down
CHI stops coloring then leans back . CHI looks down
CHI puts down one crayon then picks up a different one . CHI begins to color
CHI leans back looking down at crayons in each of his hands
CHI puts one crayon down then starts to color again
CHI leans back then holds out a crayon towards MOT
MOT picks up the crayon then colors
CHI reaches for something on the floor
<bef> CHI leans back on his heels looking down with a crayon in each hand
CHI reaches off to his side then colors on another piece of paper next to MOT
<bef> CHI looks over at MOT . CHI leans back on his knees then puts the crayons down on the paper off to his side
CHI turns while on his knees
MOT slides half of the box over to herself
CHI stands up then starts to walk across the room
MOT puts some crayons in the box
CHI walks away from MOT then turns briefly to look down . CHI turns and walks across the room
CHI has turned to face MOT but only his head is visible to the camera
MOT is out of camera range but part of the action of closing the crayon and paper box can be seen
<aft> MOT stands up and walks across the room with the box
MOT is visible from the waist down and the back of CHI head is visible to the camera
MOT walks back across the room then sets herself down on the floor with a different box
CHI jumps up and down exuberantly
CHI hops over to where MOT is then kneels down beside MOT
MOT bends over the box looking inside
MOT pulls the house out of the box
CHI moves a bit closer to the house as it comes out of the box
MOT opens up the two sides of the house
CHI bends down looking into the house
MOT sits back on the floor
MOT opens up the house a little bit wider then moves it around a little
<bef> CHI moves some toys around inside the house
<aft> CHI looks up at MOT briefly then back down . CHI reaches for the garage door then into the house
<aft> CHI puts a toy table inside the garage
MOT reaches down opening the garage door wider
CHI picks up a toy person then tries to put it in the garage
MOT leans forward looking into the toy house then leans back again
CHI tries to close the garage door
CHI concentrates on moving the toys around until he is able to close the garage door . CHI closes garage door
CHI plays by the side of the garage
<aft> CHI lays down on the floor in front of the garage . CHI glances up at MOT then reaches into the open garage
MOT reaches over then moves some toys around inside the house
CHI plays with toys inside the garage
<aft> CHI gets up on his knees facing MOT
MOT continues to move some toys around inside the house
CHI leans forward reaching for some toys
CHI leans back on his knees holding a toy
CHI looks down at the toy in his hands then up in the direction of MOT
CHI puts the toy inside the house
CHI bends down so his head rests on his hands . CHI looks into the house while in this position
<bef> CHI turns his head then reaches for something by the side of the garage
CHI places one hand on top of the house as he turns and looks into the other side of the house
CHI head and shoulders blocks the camera so his complete gesture cannot be seen
CHI looks into the house then reaches in
CHI seems to ring a bell inside the house
CHI bends down resting his head on his arm then reaches into the house
CHI blocks camera view but again rings a bell inside the house a number of times
CHI turns around then reaches into the side of the garage for something . <aft> CHI gets up on his knees to look behind the garage
MOT places a toy person on the floor in front of CHI
CHI picks up the toy then leans back on his heels . CHI looks down at the toy in his hands
MOT is out of camera range
<bef> CHI reaches for a toy bed in the house then places it on the floor in front of him
CHI puts the toy person on the bed
CHI leans back on his heels then puts his thumb in his mouth
CHI refers to having finished putting the toy on the bed
<aft> CHI reaches into the house then removes another toy bed
CHI moves the toy from the bed it was on and moves it to the new bed CHI just took out of the house
MOT places a toy on the floor in front of CHI
CHI looks down . CHI holds the little boy toy over the bed where the daddy toy is laying
CHI moves toy daddy to the other bed
<aft> CHI looks up in direction of MOT
CHI places the little boy toy in the bed where the toy daddy was before
CHI looks up in direction of MOT briefly as he leans back on his heels then looks back down
CHI looks up at MOT then reaches down
CHI takes a toy person out of the garage
CHI leans back on his heels then reaches into the house for something
CHI puts a toy chair on the floor in front of him
<aft> CHI begins to put the toy in the chair
CHI fidgets with the toy in the chair
CHI finishes putting the toy in the chair
CHI leans back . CHI looks down
CHI reaches down to the toy bed beside him then repositions the toy on the bed
CHI lets go of the toy then leans back on his heels
CHI reaches into the house removing another toy then puts it on the floor beside him
CHI picks up the chair with a toy in it
CHI moves the toy that was in the chair into the new piece of furniture CHI just removed from the house
<bef> CHI looks around as he rests one hand on top of the house
<aft> CHI picks up the toy he placed in a chair beside him
CHI holds the toy in his hand then moves on his knees just a bit closer to the house
CHI looks around on the floor
<bef> CHI looks over his shoulder then down at the toy in his hand
CHI is responding to noise outside of the room
CHI drops the toy onto the floor
<$=1> CHI looks down then around the room
<$=2> CHI picks up some toys then puts them back into the house
CHI looks up then over his shoulder
